fulltext:
CV 
Nguyen Quoc Nam 
Qualification highlights 
Interested in making mobile apps. 
Keep myself in continuous process of studying for self-improvement and look 
for a dynamic working environment, to improve myself and maybe can help 
the others. 
Title 
Mobile Developer 
Location 
Vietnam office 
Language 
Vietnamese 
English 
Experience 
12/2016 – 11/2018 
Mobile Developer  using  React Native / Xamarin 
UNICORN LTD.  
1/2019 – 4/2019 
Mobile Developer  using  React Native ,Team leader of mobile team  at Pixa 
Studio.  
Project 
GoldTime  
01/2019 – 4/2019 
Application to set up a medical appointment at the hospital, set up 
a schedule at the bank and a variety of other shops. Order at the 
associated stores, view information, transaction history ... 
Technology: Android, iOS using React native,Redux,map ,push notification , 
chat realtime... 
Scope: Team leader, Mobile Developer 
360F-MGIS  
06/2018 – 1/2018 
A platform for parents. They can create funds for their children and 
invite the others to sponsor those funds. Parents can use funds for 
their children development and track it. They will be able to manage 
who they and how much they invested (include parent investments 
and sponsor investment). Children are also be able to track his/her 
funds if their parents allow it. 
Technology: Android, iOS using React native,Redux 
Scope: Mobile Developer 
BaoMinh  
5/2017 – 8/2017 
The application of mobile insurance compensation insurance for 
motor vehicles of Bao Minh Corporation will help: 
- Automating the compensation process, especially the assessment 
and cost estimation 
- Digitize, minimize the number of documents and documents to be 
handled, exchanged between parts 
- Highly effective job notification and coordination system 
- Unified and complete data, allowing faster searching and access 
to information 
Technology: Android, iOS using C#, Xamarin 
Scope: Mobile Developer 
STARK – RELATIONSHIP MANAGER (Application for Customers) 
01/2017 – 04/2017 
The platform serves as the main communication and transaction tool for 
customer and Relationship Manager (RM) to use and perform activities 
related to insurance products and services.  
Mobile app for customer: to communicate with RM, view policy (product), 
request renewal, request quotation, approve quotation, payment, and 
submit claim. 
Technology: Android, iOS using C#, Xamarin 
Scope: Mobile Developer 
Education & Certificates/Courses 
2017: Studying  at University  of Information 
                                         Technology Tp.HCM

 
Develop cross-platform mobile app for iOS/Android with React native and Redux..

have experience working with REST API. 
 
studying and researching GraphQL and Machine learning

have worked on demo projects about nodeJS, ReactJS

Teamwork

know git and know how to use SmartGit tool.

Develop cross-platform mobile app for iOS/Android with Xamarin and C#. 
 
Knowledge of native iOS/Android apps. 
 
Design iOS UI with Xcode, support multiple iOS screen size. 
 
Almost task about UI of Android and iOS. 
 
Using MVVM architecture and MVVM library (reactiveui, mvvmlight,...) to implement mvvm to mobile 
projects. 
 
Object Oriented Programming and Design Pattern. 
 
A little knowledge of IDEs: Visual Studio, Xamarin Studio, Xcode, Android Studio.
